name: aplusb
description:
Given 
N
pairs of numbers, can you print the sum of each pair of numbers?
input:
The first line will contain a single number, 
N
. The next 
N
 lines will each contain two numbers separated by a space (for example, 
3 5
).
output: Print the sum of each pair on its own line.
explanation:
The first line of input tells us that there will be 3 pairs of integers. For the next 3 lines, we will take the two numbers and add them up.
1 + 3 = 4, so we print out 4 for the first line. 4 + -5 = -1, and 0 + 0 = 0, so we print -1 and 0.
